glosses: back to back (consecutively), one after another

examples.text: Art arda olacakmışız iki sınavı da.
examples.translation: Rumor is that we'll take both exams back to back.

examples.text: Art arda üç yıl kazanabilen takım olmadı.
examples.translation: There hasn't been a team that could win three years in a row.

glosses: in a row (placed in a straight line)

examples.translation: You'll go through a set of obstacles lined up in a row.

etymology: From art + arda, literally "back to back".
